SEARCH

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel with a list of rooms. A hotel has a name, a prefix for its rooms, and a list of rooms. Each room has a unique name, a price per night, and a status (available or booked). The hotel provides methods to create rooms, add or remove rooms, change the price per night, and manage reservations.

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String hotelName, int roomAmount, String prefix)
      Creates a new hotel with the given name, room amount, and prefix.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      roomAmount - the initial number of rooms
      prefix - the prefix for the room names

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String hotelName, int roomAmount, String prefix, double price)
      Creates a new hotel with the given name, room amount, prefix, and price per night.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      roomAmount - the initial number of rooms
      prefix - the prefix for the room names
      pricePerNight - the price per night for each room

    • getRoomPrice

      public double getRoomPrice()
      Gets the price of the room per night.
      Returns:
      room's price per night

    • createRooms

      public void createRooms()
      Creates the rooms for this hotel. This method creates a new room for each number in the range from 1 to roomAmount, using the roomPrefix and roomPricePerNight fields to initialize the room name and price. The rooms are added to the roomList field.

    • countEmptyRooms

      public int countEmptyRooms()
      Counts the number of empty rooms in this hotel.
      Returns:
      the number of empty rooms in this hotel

    • addRooms

      public void addRooms()
      Adds rooms to this hotel. This method prompts the user to enter the number of rooms to add, and then adds that many rooms to the hotel. The rooms are given names based on the roomPrefix field and the current size of the roomList field.

    • removeRooms

      public void removeRooms()
      Removes rooms from this hotel. This method removes up to amount empty rooms from the hotel, starting from the last room. If there are not enough empty rooms to remove, the method does nothing.

    • changePricePerNight

      public void changePricePerNight()
      Changes the price per night for all rooms in this hotel. This method prompts the user to enter a new price per night, and then sets the roomPricePerNight field to that value. It also sets the price per night for all rooms in the roomList field.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation()
      Removes a reservation from a room in this hotel. This method first displays all reservations in the hotel. Then it prompts the user to select a reservation to remove, and removes that reservation from the corresponding room.

    • lowLevelRoomAvailability

      public void lowLevelRoomAvailability()
      Displays the availability of rooms in this hotel on a given date. This method prompts the user to enter a date, and then displays the total number of rooms in the hotel, the number of empty rooms on the given date, and the number of booked rooms on the given date.

    • lowLevelRoomInformation

      public void lowLevelRoomInformation()
      Displays information about a room in this hotel. This method first displays all rooms in the hotel. Then it prompts the user to select a room to view, and displays the name, price per night, and availability of that room.

    • lowLevelReservationDetails

      public void lowLevelReservationDetails()
      Displays details about a reservation in this hotel. This method first displays all reservations in the hotel. Then it prompts the user to select a reservation to view, and displays the details of that reservation.

    • createReservation

      public void createReservation()
      Creates a new reservation in a room in this hotel. This method prompts the user to enter a name and check-in and check-out dates for the reservation. It then finds an available room for the given dates and creates a new reservation for that room.

    • findRoom

      public int findRoom(String roomName)
      Finds the index of a room with the given name in this hotel.
      Parameters:
      roomName - the name of the room to find
      Returns:
      the index of the room with the given name, or -1 if no such room exists

    • setHotelName

      public void setHotelName(String hotelName)
      Sets the name of this hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the new name of the hotel

    • isHotelEmpty

      public Boolean isHotelEmpty()
      Checks whether this hotel is empty.
      Returns:
      true if this hotel has no non-empty rooms, and false otherwise

    • setRoomPricePerNight

      public void setRoomPricePerNight(double amount)
      Sets the price per night for all rooms in this hotel.
      Parameters:
      amount - the new price per night for all rooms in this hotel

    • AvailableRoomIndex

      public int AvailableRoomIndex(int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Finds the index of the first available room for the given dates.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the index of the first available room, or -1 if no room is available

    • getEstimatedEarnings

      public double getEstimatedEarnings()
      Calculates the estimated earnings of this hotel.
      Returns:
      the estimated earnings of this hotel

    • displayReservations

      public void displayReservations()
      Displays all reservations in this hotel.

    • displayRooms

      public void displayRooms()
      Displays all rooms in this hotel.

    • findRes

      public int findRes(String reservationID)
      Finds the index of the room with a reservation matching the given ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationID - the ID of the reservation to find
      Returns:
      the index of the room with the matching reservation, or -1 if no such reservation exists

    • checkEmptyRooms

      public int checkEmptyRooms(int day)
      Counts the number of empty rooms on a given day.
      Parameters:
      day - the day to check
      Returns:
      the number of empty rooms on the given day
